reviews.review_msg: Incredibly good at her job. Wholeheartedly inspired and inspiring. It's so hard to find a professor that genuinely sparks thought and makes you care beyond class. Absolutely love her teaching style, her approach is that of an elementary school teacher in the way she's genuinely curious about her students, the course, and everything around us

One of the best professors I had in SFU, I took two other courses with her and I would take more! Her lectures and seminars are extremely interesting and she's so passionate about teaching. Love all the courses i took with her!
